column1: Little Goat Diner////I love that they take ur number down and text u when ur table is ready
column2: bout time. We were seated in about 20 mins on an early sat evening
column3: so that was great! We wanted to get everything
column4: so hard to narrow it down. Hubby got the Los drowned braised beef sandwich- sooooooooo good! And I got the bulls eye French toast- mmmm mmm! We also tried the tempura mashed potatoes and the fried pickles and onion rings. Oh wait and the cinnamon roll. Yeah we over ordered
column6: we work out hard for our food!!! Â Everything was delicious. I actually think I like little goat a tad bit better than girl and the goat?! I cannot wait to come back!!!!!
